name: UHero (Hero_Rico) (Hero_Rico)
description:
This is a short roguelike game with 1 area.  All kinds of suggestions are appreciated

You are an adventurer who got lost in a kingdom of monsters, fight through randomly generated dungeons and learn about it. Play alone,  or with friends! You can use a Keyboards and Controllers!

Keyboard

  • Move. Use arrow keys.
  • Attack. D
  • Jump. Space
  • Interact. Q
  • Dash/Parry. S
  • Throw Shuriken. F
  • Skill 1.1
  • Skill 2. 2
  • Use Consumable.  Left Alt
  • Inventory Up. Left Shift
  • Inventory Down. Left Control
  • Map. M
  • Options. Escape
  • Toggle Fullscreen N

    • Gamepad

  • Move. Left Stick
  • Attack. 🔳
  • Jump. X
  • Interact. R1
  • Dash/Parry. ⚪
  • Throw Shuriken. △
  • Skill 1.R2
  • Skill 2. L2
  • Use Consumable.  Dpad-right
  • Inventory Up. Dpad-Up
  • Inventory Down. Dpad-Down
  • Map.  L1
  • Options. Share Button
